sentences.sContent: Usually so laconic in the office, Dr. Lahey seemed less guarded, more relaxed.
sentences.sCn: 平常在办公室里寡言少语的莱希医生似乎少了些拘谨，多了几分轻松。

remMethod.val: la (看作lack， 缺乏) + con (精读) + ic → 不需要精读的 → 简明的

words.tran: 简洁；警句；简洁的语句；（语句的）简短

trans.tranOther: using only a few words to say something
